title: Drawing, "Lantern of Dome of St. Peter's Basilica Seen Against the Left Bank of the Tiber River, Rome, Italy.", January 1868
title_raw: Lantern of Dome of St. Peter's Basilica Seen Against the Left Bank of the Tiber River, Rome, Italy.
inscribed:
Recto:  Inscribed in graphite at upper right: 2 Blue / 3 purple Blue; and again at lower right: st. Peters Jan / 68
Verso:  Inscribed in graphite at upper margin:  O Sky lowtoned and not clear blue / general plan - Mass of open sky contrasted / to rich luminous browns gold orange / greenish
description:
Recto: Horizontal view showing the Piazza di San Pietero with one of the fountains in the left foreground and two soldiers with shouldered guns marching in front of the colonnades.

Verso: Horizontal view with the lantern of the dome of St. Peter's Basilica shown in the left foreground against the background of the left Tiber River bank and the sky.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, "Lantern of Dome of St. Peter's Basilica Seen Against the Left Bank of the Tiber River, Rome, Italy.", January 1868. Graphite on paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-154.
